Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "Streamline OpenXmlElementContext initialization" (#448) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
This fixes up OpenXmlElementContext in a few ways:

- Initializes things on a path such that items can be marked as readonly
- Removes custom event handling to default to compiler generated one. The current one is not thread safe and provides no benefit over the default one
- Adds unit tests to cover various aspects of the context

Opened issue "Add support for exporting images in .net core" (#216) at OfficeDev/Open-Xml-PowerTools
Events.RelatedBody:
Dear Reader,

Currently I cannot export images in .net core since ImageInfo has a bitmap property, where I get the following error:

Error	CS7069	Reference to type 'Bitmap' claims it is defined in 'System.Drawing', but it could not be found	DefaultProcessorImplementation	

when I want to use 'imageInfo.Bitmap.Save(ms, imageFormat);' in the ImageHandler. I did try to add the 'System.Drawing.Common' package from nuget, but that did not resolve the error.

Thank you in advance for your help and for making this package available,

Arthur

Closed pull request "[Fix] Order of sources influences insertId outcome" (#50) at OfficeDev/Open-Xml-PowerTools
Events.RelatedBody:
When doing a BuildDocument, Source objects without Id should be processed first, to ensure Source object with insertId can be inserted.

I do an Orderby to ensure the 'optimized' order of execution.
